item.description:
This is a new location for our meetup but the band is Four on the Floor so it should be a good time and a nice opportunity to try a new place. The band places from 9-1. If you are interested in arriving at 7:30 for dinner please reply in your response no later than Thursday June 11 and I will call for a reservation for the group.

Menu: http://www.tannertave...

Directions:
Take I-95 / MA-128
Exit 35 (RT-38 toward Woburn / Wilmington)
Enter rotary and exit onto MA-38 S / Main St.
Travel 1.4 miles and Tanner Tavern will be on your right.

Take I-93
Exit 37B to merge onto I-95 / MA-128
Exit 35 (RT-38 toward Woburn / Wilmington)
Enter rotary and exit onto MA-38 S / Main St.
Travel 1.4 miles and Tanner Tavern will be on your right.

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Dancing at Tanner Tavern
